from collections import Counter
t = int(input())
for ni in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    s1 = list(s[0::2])
    s2 = list(s[1::2])
    s1.sort()
    s2.sort()
    if s1 == s2:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

def solve(x):
    if x == x[::-1]:
        print('YES')
        return
    s1 = ''
    s2 = ''
    for i in range(len(x)):
        if i % 2 == 0:
            s2 += x[i]
            continue
        s1 += x[i]
    if sorted(s1) == sorted(s2):
        print('YES')
        return
    print('NO')
    return
x = int(input())
for i in range(x):
    y = input()
    z = input()
    solve(z)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (N, A) = (int(input()), input())
    symb_even = sorted(''.join([A[j] for j in range(N) if j % 2 == 0]))
    symb_odd = sorted(''.join([A[j] for j in range(N) if j % 2 != 0]))
    print('YES' if symb_even == symb_odd else 'NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    i = int(input())
    string = input()
    l1 = [string[x - 1] for x in range(1, i + 1) if x % 2 == 0]
    l2 = [string[x - 1] for x in range(1, i + 1) if x % 2 != 0]
    print('YES') if sorted(l1) == sorted(l2) else print('NO')

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    p = sorted(s[::2])
    q = sorted(s[1::2])
    print('YES' if p == q else 'NO')
